name: Hallofair VR
description:
Hallofair is a game created for the AR/VR Creators' Fall Challenge: Halloween game jam

This is a Virtual Reality game that should work on an Oculus Quest (haven't tested it on other headsets)

For playing

  • Enter and go into one of the wooden "tents"
  • Either
    • Grab the pumpkins and throw them into the basket
    • Take the weapon and hit the tiny monsters
  • Press the button on the right to restart the game

The assets used for creating the game are:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/free-witchcraft-and-wizardry-asse...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/pbr-material-bundle-...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/chibii-mon...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/polyquest-worlds-full-pack...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/spooky-cemetery-bu...
